channel.title: How to add a background image to a Jlist
channel.description:
I'm trying to add a background to this JList [img]http://i.imgur.com/zRsZABw.png[/img]
I've spent several hours on google trying to figure it out, but no prevail
p.s if you need the source code to help me, let me know

item.title: How to add a background image to a Jlist
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Learn to use google. It’s very resourceful…

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a background image to a Jlist

item.title: How to add a background image to a Jlist
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

I’m having trouble with this, is there any chance you could find/make an example of a JList background image to help me better understand

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a background image to a Jlist

item.title: How to add a background image to a Jlist
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

need to use a custom cellrenderer or override the default, set the cell opaqueness to false; then paint the image over the frame itself.

here’s with a jtable: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10245305/how-to-add-image-background-on-jtable-that-does-not-scroll-when-scrolling-jtab

Read full topic
